job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Work with the #1 leader in cloud security! Aggressive base, weekly lunch, taco Tuesdays, Unlimited PTO, and much more!
This Jobot Job is hosted by Bashar Sbeini
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $120,000 - $150,000 per year
A Bit About Us
We are the #1 cloud security company worldwide! Our AI analytics allows us to lead in this industry with modern day cloud solutions.
Why join us?
Aggressive base
Competitive dental/medical plan
Flexible PTO
Enjoy breakfast burritos every Tuesday!
Weekly lunches provided
Snacks
Fun culture
Job Details
At least 5 years of experience developing, debugging, and maintaining cloud based services and solutions
Experience in Python or C/C++ required
Mastery in backend languages is highly desired(Golang, Rust, Java, Etc.)
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
